001package src.pkg_rooms;
002import src.pkg_items.Item;
003
004/**
005 * Represents a trap door in the game that extends a Door.
006 * A trap door can either be a regular door or a trap door that may trigger specific behavior.
007 * @author Pierre MATAR
008 */
009public class TrapDoor extends Door
010{
011    private boolean aIsTrapDoor;
012    
013     /**
014     * Constructs a TrapDoor with a specified lock status, key, and trap door status.
015     * 
016     * @param pIsLocked Indicates whether the door is locked.
017     * @param pKeyDoor The key (item) required to open the door.
018     * @param pIsTrapDoor Indicates if the door is a trap door.
019     */
020    public TrapDoor(final boolean pIsLocked, final Item pKeyDoor, final boolean pIsTrapDoor) {
021        super(pIsLocked, pKeyDoor);
022        this.aIsTrapDoor = pIsTrapDoor;
023    }
024    
025    /**
026     * @return true if the door is a trap door, false otherwise.
027     */
028    
029    public boolean isTrapDoor() {
030        return this.aIsTrapDoor;
031    }
032    
033}
